main.*:
'''Aunt Marilyn''' is [[Ross Geller|Ross]] and [[Monica Geller|Monica]]'s aunt and the possible mother of [[Cassie]]. Monica mentions her in "[[The One With Ross and Monica's Cousin]]", when she says that Cassie looks exactly like her. [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] was intrigued by the idea and excitedly asks if "Aunt Marilyn" is coming to the wedding. She is never seen though.
